attributes.region: The North'''House Holt''' is a noble house from the North. They are situated in White Harbor.==Known Members==*Errold Holt, a member of the Night's Watch.<ref>"The Sword in the Darkness"</ref>==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, House Holt is a noble house from the North who once held Wolf's Den.==See also==*AWOIAF

'''House Holt''' is a noble house from [[the North]]. They are situated in [[White Harbor]].
sections.Known Members: *[[Errold Holt]], a member of the [[Night's Watch]].<ref>"[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Holt is a noble house from [[the North]] who once held Wolf's Den.
